title: Tantalus and Ixion Suffering Torment in the Underworld
description: Tantalus and Ixion Suffering Torment in the Underworld; Unknown; Paris, France; about 1405; Tempera colors, gold leaf, and ink on parchment bound between pasteboard covered with dark red morocco; Leaf: 36.7 x 26 cm (14 7/16 x 10 1/4 in.); Ms. Ludwig XV 7, fol. 120v; J.
